    • defaultGenerateMazeFinal

      @GetMapping("/mazeinfo/defaultFinal/{generationType}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<int[][]> defaultGenerateMazeFinal(@PathVariable("generationType") String generationType)
      Generates and returns maze based on requested type.
      Parameters:
      generationType - specifies type of generation for maze
      Returns:
      2d int array representing maze

    • generateMazeFinal

      @GetMapping("/mazeinfo/final/{generationType}/{dimensions}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<int[][]> generateMazeFinal(@PathVariable("generationType") String generationType, @PathVariable("dimensions") int dimensions)
      Generates and returns maze based on requested dimensions and type.
      Parameters:
      generationType - type of maze to generate
      dimensions - dimension to use for generating maze
      Returns:
      maze

    • defaultGenerateMazeFull

      @GetMapping("/mazeinfo/defaultFull/{generationType}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<int[][]>> defaultGenerateMazeFull(@PathVariable("generationType") String generationType)
      Generates and returns maze generation steps based on requested type.
      Parameters:
      generationType - specifies type of generation for maze
      Returns:
      list of steps for generation of maze

    • checkSolution

      @PostMapping("/mazeinfo/check") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> checkSolution(@RequestBody int[][] attempt)
      Checks solution to maze using Maze class' check solution method.
      Parameters:
      attempt - attempt at solving maze
      Returns:
      true or false for correct solution
